rare.title: Creamy Yellow Log
rare.details: One of the members of your party finds a rare box of twinkies. Roll to decide who found it!

uncommon.title: BANDITS!
uncommon.details: You find a group of bandits and there's 2 to 5 of them. Prepare to fight!

common.title: Zombebe
common.details: You find a singular zombie, no more, no less.
